title: News24.com | 'Covid-19 less important because we now fear law enforcement' - family of man killed during lockdown
description: Three weeks after a Vosloorus man was killed at home, his family is still struggling to come to terms with the events.
content:
"The minute that incident happened, Covid-19 became almost non-important and less of a fear, because we are now fearing our law enforcement." 
LIVE | All the latest coronavirus and lockdown updates
These are the sobering words of Ntombikayise Amos, the sist… [+3841 chars]
